shortcv.p: Helen Bisbiki is a graduate of the Department of Management Science and Technology in Athens University of Economics and Business. She has worked at the Business Development Department and the Merchant Acquiring Department of Piraeus Direct Services (Piraeus Group) and is currently working in National Bank of Greece. She is a member of ISTLab/OIS since 2004 and her research interests are on the e-learning field (content and interface design).
